version_description:
* Sign up for a new Clubhouse account when you first download the app.
* Introducing a shiny new emoji picker to pick any emoji
* We uncovered the comment input on the Epic screen so you can actually see what you’re typing.
* Slowed down the reor

• Fixed navigation to the epic of a story
• Signing in through Google is now available
Get started using Clubhouse faster: Signup with your Google Account to get going with Clubhouse in a matter of a few taps

• Improved caching between screens so that you can get the information you need from various views even faster
• Fixed a bug where the Send button would be enabled for the comment input even after deleting your comment
• Mentions in Story and Epic d

• Fixed a long standing bug where the correct Story screen would not appear when opening a push notification or deep link. Apologies this bug fix took so long to get right.
• Introducing Iterations! If you have Iterations enabled for your Workspace, yo

• Story references are now rendered as badges
• Fixed a formatting issue in the Markdown that could lead to a crash
• Fixed a bug where the comment input does not clear after sending a comment
• Fixed a crash when mentioning someone in a comment

• You can now create a label when one isn't available!
• The Story screen got its first pass of refreshment, more are coming

• You can now edit or delete a comment you left in a story
• Labels and icons were added in the Add Story screen to ensure consistency between screens
• Fixed an issue with Copy and Copy as Markdown where nothing was copied
• Fixed a bug where da

• Introducing Story relationships! They are now displayed in the Story Screen and you can navigate between them
• The Story Screen has been split into tabs, comments are just a swipe away!
• Mentions will now be correctly rendered in edited comments

• Fixed an issue where sign-in with Google did not work.
• Fixed an issue where the text hints for the login screen were unreadable
• Submit a comment on a story and you'll be scrolled right to it when you submit!

• We heard you! Adding yourself as a follower is now quicker than ever with a one-tap button from the Story screen
• Story Relationships can now be removed
• Improved the UX of the contextual menu for comments to ensure it's covering the entire scre

• Adding story relationships to a story is now available!
• Fixed a bug where “Add Followers” option did not show up if a story did not have any followers
• Fixed a bug where the followers field did not scale well horizontally
• Fixed a bug where

• Introducing tabs to replace segmented controls
• Archived Stories will be displayed as so with an Archived mention and a grey header
• Fixed an issue where section titles were reversed in Epics list
• Improved Story description's actions layout
• Fixed an issue where the input could be hidden behind the keyboard

• We are in the process of implementing a new robust drag and drop and had to disable it for this build, but you can still move your story position between different workflows and change the Story priority when you long press on a Story card in the Storie

• Viewing an external ticket in a Story is now available!
• We've redesigned our Story screen so that you can scroll down to see a Story's comments!
• You can now write multiline comments in a Story!
• Directly deep link into a comment is now ava

• Introducing Dark Mode!
• You can now archive and unarchived stories
• Significant performance improvements under the hood to keep the app running at tip top speed by tweaking when and how we do caching
• Improved the navigation flow when signin

We ran into an issue that caused some errors to be triggered into our bug reporting tools. Those errors were safely recovered and didn’t have any impact on users, but we made sure to quickly fixed it.

• Share an epic is now available
• You can now view an epic and an epic comment in our mobile app when following a link from an outside app!
• Push notifications are now highlighting and scrolling you to comment you just clicked
• We've fixed som

• We replaced the Spaces screen and added a new header to the Stories screen to quickly select a new workflow or space
• You can now upload a video into a Story and see video attachments
• Story templates are back! (Oops, sorry!)
• We've fixed ou

• Adding an epic is now available
• Fixed a bug where the description of an Epic couldn’t be edited
• Added an empty state for Epic’s stories list

• We heard you and you shouldn't have to deal with outdated story cards. That's why, from now, changes made to stories will automatically be reflected into the columns view
• Stories will automatically be refreshed from time to time
• You can now pu

• We heard you! Introducing the option to move story cards to the top or at the bottom of a column
• Uploading attachments won't lead to an infinite loading screen anymore
• Modals are pop-ups that were eagerly dismissed are no more, the ability to
Bug fixes and performance improvements to keep the app running at tip-top speed
